text:
【Today’s Topic】

The third batch of Pfizer-BioNTech’s COVID-19 vaccine arrived at Narita Airport on Monday morning.

The shipment contained 87,750 vials. The amount will be enough for about 520,000 does, covering about 260,000 vacinations.
#COVID19  #ワクチン #vaccine  #Pfiz https://t.co/K5LWB9gVLn
